amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 116-6 to include substance or drug abuse counseling in the definition of "covered health care services.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rose (NY) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Rose (NY).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose (NY) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
